page_analysis.text_content:
Fig 8 Entry feature with 2nd floor above

Note: The 2nd floor over a vaulted entry will count as usual. Therefore, the area will count three times toward gross floor area.

Note: If the entryway is considered to be a vaulted entryway the area will be counted as follows:
• In this example, a portion of the entryway is recessed beyond the house facade and roof. It is included in the area that counts.
• The area is measured to the outside material of the entryway feature.
• The area counts TWICE toward gross floor area.

Isometric View
Side Elevation
Porch Floor Plan

visual_elements.description: Isometric view of a building corner showing an entry feature with a 2nd floor above. The height from grade to the bottom of the 2nd floor is indicated. Dashed lines mark the intersection of the front facade and underside or bottom of the 2nd floor.

Side elevation view of the same entry feature showing the height dimension from grade to the bottom of the 2nd floor. Labels indicate 'Top of 2nd floor' and 'Bottom of 2nd floor'. A dashed vertical line marks the intersection of the front facade and underside or bottom of the 2nd floor.

Porch floor plan showing the outline of the entryway floor area that counts TWICE if the entryway is vaulted. The outline is marked with a thick black line. The door swing is shown at the top of the plan.
Gray shaded box containing the note: 'Note: The 2nd floor over a vaulted entry will count as usual. Therefore, the area will count three times toward gross floor area.'

technical_specifications.parameter: Gross floor area multiplier for 2nd floor over vaulted entry
Gross floor area multiplier for vaulted entryway floor area

additional_notes: Page number 13 at bottom right corner.
No handwritten annotations or stamps detected.
Text and diagrams are clear and legible.

qualifiers.text: If the entryway is considered to be a vaulted entryway

conditions.text: The area counts TWICE toward gross floor area.
The 2nd floor over a vaulted entry will count as usual. Therefore, the area will count three times toward gross floor area.

logical_relationships.expression: If the entryway is considered to be a vaulted entryway then the area counts TWICE toward gross floor area.
If there is a 2nd floor over a vaulted entry then the area will count three times toward gross floor area.

execution_sequence.action: Determine if the entryway is vaulted.
If vaulted, count the entryway floor area TWICE toward gross floor area.
If there is a 2nd floor over the vaulted entry, count that area THREE times toward gross floor area.
